let index = 0;

const typingSpeed = 100; // A gÃ©pelÃ©s sebessÃ©ge
const erasingSpeed = 50; // A tÃ¶rlÃ©s sebessÃ©ge
const delayBetweenTexts = 2000; // KÃ©sleltetÃ©s a szÃ¶vegek kÃ¶zÃ¶tt (ms)
const element = document.querySelector('.typing-effect');

function type() {
  const currentText = texts[index];

  } else {

      index = (index + 1) % texts.length; // KÃ¶vetkezÅ‘ szÃ¶veg
      setTimeout(type, typingSpeed);
    } else {
      setTimeout(type, erasingSpeed);
    }
  }
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  setTimeout(type, typingSpeed);
});
